titles.title: Complete and Permanent Property Tax Deduction Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand and make permanent the standard deduction for real property taxes.
Complete and Permanent Property Tax Deduction Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Complete and Permanent Property Tax Deduction Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make the standard tax deduction for real property taxes permanent; and (2) repeal the dollar limitation on such deduction and the exclusion of foreign real property taxes.
